name: community-project
description: ## Getting Started - ``` git clone https://github.com/rbrtbrnschn/community-project.git ``` - ``` cd community-project ``` - ``` npm i ``` - rename SAMPLE.env to .env

scripts.dev-install: npm i concurrently && concurrently "npm i" "cd server && npm i" "cd client && npm i"
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd server && npm run dev" "cd client && npm run dev" "cd client && gulp watch"
